concept.title: SMC PGI 5304.201 Procedures

conbody.p: (a) Systems/Non-Operational contracts - see the ConWrite User Guide in establishing your award in ConWrite. Visit the CONWRITE CORNER to access the ConWrite User Guide, ConWrite training materials and for all other assistance with ConWrite.
(b) Operational contracts – Visit the Air Force Contracting Central CON-IT training website to access the CON-IT User Guide and up-to-date training materials.
